name: Megharth Lakhataria
bio: I'm a student looking forward for challenging projects in the field of web development or graphic design.
Currently I'm pursuing my B.Tech (IT) from Birla Vishvakarma Mahavidyalaya.
I like to take a try on new things and I give my best to achieve the desired target.
I'm not planning to take a job, instead, I will be completing my masters.
